```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("dplyr")
```

```{r questionTwo}
iris <- read.csv("iris.csv")
histogram <- hist(iris$Petal.Length,
                  breaks=seq(0,8,l=17),
                  main="Petal Lengths of Setosas, Virginicas, and Versicolors",
                  xlab="Petal Lengths (in cm)",
                  ylab="Frequency")
```

The shape of the histogram is bimodal. The percentage of iris flowers with a petal length less than or equal to 2cm is .3267. 

